lender.name: Kim
lender.occupation: I am a college student eagerly awaiting graduation
lender.loan_because: Luke 3: 11: "He who has two tunics, let him give to him who has none; and he who has food let him do likewise."

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: giving is important
lender.occupational_info: I help entertainment companies resolve contract and intellectual property disputes in court.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: Bill Clinton’s book confirmed that everyone, no matter how large or small the donation, has something to give whether it is money, time, clothing, etc. I did volunteer work at a mission in Ethiopia and understand first hand just how much the people of third world countries need our help.
lender.occupational_info: I work with general surgery resident physicians in the capacity of mother, counselor, advisor, friend, and anything else that falls under the category of mother.

lender.name: CaptaLoans
lender.loan_because: We love this concept!
lender.occupational_info: We are software developers.

lender.name: Tim

lender.loan_because: What a great way to make a big difference in someone's life!

lender.occupation: Director of Operations of a non profit

lender.loan_because: a little bit goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I study what makes people behave the way they do.

lender.occupational_info: I help people manage and save their money.

lender.occupational_info: retired

lender.name: Keisha
lender.occupational_info: a cleaner of the natural environment

lender.name: Cyndi & Steve
lender.loan_because: We want to share our many blessings with other people, with hopes they can share their blessings with other people . . . and so-on.
lender.occupational_info:
Cyndi - I have a passion for healthy skin, and own a handmade goatmilk soap business, Nice Touch Soap.
Steve - works for the State of California as a Project Manager. He authorizes funding for the construction, rebuilding, or remodeling of schools.

lender.loan_because: Such a small contribution can help someone build a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Working at a store chain selling comics, boardgames and sci/fi and fantasy books.

lender.loan_because: i want to help you to have better life
lender.occupational_info: i give advices to people to earn more in their business.

lender.loan_because: these entrepreneurs need the interest on my money more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I write papers about Economics.

lender.name: Sopheap
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves and give them a head start to the best life they can have
lender.occupational_info: I work in a lab doing research in Developmental Biology in Irvine, CA

lender.name: Farez
lender.loan_because: I want to help eradicate poverty.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: It's good to help.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I need the money for my company. Ive made a company and need some money to keep it up and running.
lender.occupational_info: Its difficult to keep all the products in keeping alive. I have so much do to at home. Im not married though but I want to be rich at what I do. Help me

lender.name: Homepro
lender.loan_because: lending money is a respectful way to offer some help.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much. Pay it forward!

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: Kiva=pure, lovely, admirable.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the general manager of an independent record label and talent incubator

lender.name: Paul
lender.occupation: Respiratory Therapist at a children\'s hospital

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: It is right to lend a hand to each other.

lender.name: Siobhan
lender.loan_because: I believe small changes make big differences.
lender.occupational_info: I connect people so that they can do business together and keep the world moving forward.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate, many others not so.
lender.occupational_info: Volunteer tutor in public schools; volunteer in field of environmental education

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I am amazed at the strength and eagerness of these entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies solve problems for their software needs.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people fish instead of fishing for them.
lender.occupational_info: I sit in front of a couple of boxes flickering my fingers to create systems to help people do their job with more information. (I'm a computer geek)

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I don't have a lot, but I know I have much more than most globally, and this is what I can do for now. I'm happy to be part of giving people an opportunity to create a sound future for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Ella
lender.loan_because: I think it is a much better use of my savings than leaving it in a savings account or stressing myself out trying to make money off investments.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an architecture firm that focuses on sustainable design.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I want to empower other people to fulfill their dreams as an entrepeneur.

lender.name: Global Kids: LICHS, NYC
lender.occupation: Global Kids: 30 students at LIC High School, NYC
lender.loan_because:
WE WANT TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN THE WORLD!!
Global Kids runs various after school programs at Long Island City High School in Queens, New York.
In general we want to inspire young people to develop their leadership capacities to become the best they can be.
Our program with freshmen students is focused on community service activities and has proven to be a positive and successful program.
On average, 15-20 students consistently attend the program week-to-week.
In January Global Kids collaborated with Stephen Shames Foundation to invite two Ugandan child soldiers as special guest to LIC HS. Katongole Godfrey and Ojok Charles were guest speakers during or workshop, they met with the students and shared their life experiences with the group. Excited and filled with hope, the students have decided to support small business entrepreneurs in third world countries through Kiva.org, an organization focused on helping people around the world using microfinance loans.
lender.occupational_info: Global Kids (GK) is an organisation working in NYC high schools. We are committed to transforming urban youth into successful students as well as global and community leaders. Using interactive and experiential methods to educate youth about critical international and foreign policy issues, GK provides students with opportunities for civic and global engagement.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I feel strongly that I am called to do so. I have been given much, more than I deserve and it is my privilege to help others!

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I believe the real solution to poverty is not taking care of people, but helping them take care of themselves (which is exactly what I can do through Kiva)

lender.name: Tegwyn
lender.loan_because: I feel like even though I am 13 years old, if I can change even in one persons life, I can change the world. And that gives me hope.
lender.occupational_info: Lending helps me make a difference.

lender.name: mark
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I examine the body looking for cancer

lender.name: Kristin Taliaferro
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a break now and again and I'm happy to help. Plus, I'm impressed with all of the shining faces I see here and the enterprising people trying really hard to make ends meet, feed their families or run a business. Life isn't a monopoly game. We weren't all born with the same opportunities. So, it's important to level the field by helping out.
lender.occupational_info: I am excited about the way the recipients of these loans must feel when they realize a total stranger helped them out. It makes the world feel smaller and gives everyone (the giver and receiver) a sense of magic in the world.....

lender.name: Gilles
lender.loan_because: I prefer loans compared to gifts because it encourages initiative and I am sure that the people we support are proud of being able to make a living for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I was an electronics technician for 34 years working at an international airport. I am now retired since 2005.

lender.name: The Watson Family
lender.loan_because: we like to help others help themselves. It is exciting and empowering for our children to choose how much of their own money they want to add to ours and to help choose the loan recipients.
lender.occupational_info: R works in publishing textbooks. S is a mom and homeschools (mostly with a "worldschooling" / "unschooling" approach). A, M, J, and R learn, read, and grow together.

lender.name: Kylena
lender.loan_because: Money is Energy. By giving prosperity others have more to give.
lender.occupational_info: I assist others be leaders in Business and Personal Development.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I think that the world can be better if we all try.

lender.name: The Rosemere Cosmo Girls
lender.loan_because: It makes us feel great and we can see that we are helping. Cheers! xox

lender.name: NineByZero.com Magazine
lender.occupational_info: Beauty and Makeup Magazine

lender.name: DJ's Daughter
lender.loan_because: There is a need.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur and investor within investment management and communications businesses.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: people find dignity in supporting themselves and their families.

lender.name: Ramon
lender.loan_because: I want to share with others what God has graciously given my family & me. Yo presto dinero porque quiero compartir con otros de lo que Dios me ha dado a mi y a mi familia en su gran misericordia.

lender.name: Ali
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be in a position to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work on behalf of several publishers, and sell their books to bookstore buyers.

lender.name: Nate
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to give someone the opportunity to provide for their family and community
lender.occupational_info: Navigating officer aboard ocean-going ships

lender.loan_because: I'm bored.

lender.name: Karen
lender.occupational_info: I make embroidery designs for embroidery machines.

lender.name: Newark Academy
lender.loan_because: We are a student-run initiative within our school community. Part of our school's mission-statement is to promote "Global Citizenship," and we feel that Kiva's efforts are a fantastic way to stress the importance of real-world philanthropy.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of students who fund-raise as a collective in order to be able to contribute to Kiva's entrepreneurs. Led by Mike Mszański and Shanel Mehta, both Newark Academy class of 2009.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with a love of business and it has been one of the most liberating experiences. I know how risky it is...and how it feels when you succeed. I also give because my motto is "make a living, make a life, and make a difference!"
lender.occupational_info: I own three businesses. A rental property management / investment firm that manages more than 450 properties, am part owner in a deer processing business, and now have invested in a chocolate shop called 'Never Enough Chocolate".

lender.name: Hortensia
lender.loan_because: I love to help peope who have the desire to succed in life.
lender.occupational_info: Interesting, allows me to meet people around the world

lender.name: JPII - Jaguars
lender.loan_because: We can.
lender.occupational_info: As a class we study business but also raise money for charity and make contributions to our different school campaigns.

lender.name: Michelle & Chris
lender.loan_because: We've been given so much in our lives and have so many things to be thankful for. We're trying to do our little part to make things better for someone else.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: There's this great story which I have made into my philosophy in life that if you give a person a fish you feed them for a day, but with a fishing rod, their whole life. The problem with charities for me has always been the question you ask yourself, are you giving a fish or the fishing rod. In my view encouraging economic enterprise is the one way guaranteed to lift the unfortunate people of this world out of poverty. If I can help people realise their dreams and make a better life for themselves and their families and communities, and not disempower them in the process then I have, at the very least, a moral obligation to do so - but this gives me joy - to share the bounty of living in a prosperous first world country.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Director of a boutique coffee roasting business which imports raw coffee, roasts and blends it, and sells it in Australia.

lender.name: Shahnaz
lender.loan_because: It is such a small way to make a HUGE difference in someone's life!

lender.name: Bethany
lender.loan_because: I've always disliked the idea of giving to a large charity where I can't see what happens to my money. I haven't got the time or resources to personally travel and try and change the world, so Kiva allows me to directly contribute to another person without needing to leave the country.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell rigid packaging (bottles,caps, cans, drums, etc.)

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help others open the door to more opportunities than they would otherwise be able to achieve.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the online travel business, managing the Airline and Car Rental products for Hotwire.com, a discount travel subsidiary of Expedia.com.

lender.name: Renee-Lauren
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can and folks need it.

lender.name: Kim and Shawn
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping women develop businesses to support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I teach history at the high school level.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: to whom much has been given much is expected
lender.occupational_info: I work with business owners like yourself. I provide Life, dental and disability insurance for their employees. If an employee dies their families will receive money to help them. If an employee is sick and cannot work we will pay them money to they can still take care of their families. If they have a toothache we will help them pay to treat the toothache

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Helping others around the world made easy.

lender.name: Carl
lender.occupational_info: Basically I'm just a student trying to understand the world and help it along.

lender.name: Nam
lender.loan_because: i'm more fortunate than these people and want to empower these less fortunate people to help themselves, their families.. the end goal is everyone to have the basics in life. Anything less is just unfair on them.
lender.occupational_info: i run my own business and a bigger scale than most of these people but the principles are the same. I wish you guys the best of luck and success.

lender.name: David & Sandy
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is what will create permanent change.

lender.name: Nolan
lender.loan_because:
Microfinance is an extremely productive use of money. To a person living in poverty, a little help can make a large impact.
Lending money to low-income entrepreneurs through Christian microfinance institutions reduces poverty and spreads the Gospel of Jesus Christ. The good accomplished in these two areas has tremendous potential to multiply long after the loan has been paid off.
The life of a Christian may be the only "Bible" another person ever "reads". Jesus’ love is demonstrated to people through Christians who help meet their needs. As Jesus said in Matthew 5:16, "...let your light shine before men, that they may see your good deeds and praise your Father in heaven."
"He who oppresses the poor shows contempt for their Maker, but whoever is kind to the needy honors God." – Proverbs 14:31
"Your prayers and gifts to the poor have come up as a memorial offering before God." – Acts 10:4
"He who is kind to the poor lends to the LORD, and he will reward him for what he has done." – Proverbs 19:17
"This is how we know what love is: Jesus Christ laid down his life for us. And we ought to lay down our lives for our brothers. If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him? Dear children, let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth. This then is how we know that we belong to the truth, and how we set our hearts at rest in his presence whenever our hearts condemn us. For God is greater than our hearts, and he knows everything." – 1 John 3:16-20
“You will be enriched in every way so that you can be generous on every occasion, and through us your generosity will result in thanksgiving to God. This service that you perform is not only supplying the needs of the Lord’s people but is also overflowing in many expressions of thanks to God.” – 2 Corinthians 9:11-12
See also: Isaiah 58 (True Fasting) Matthew 6:19-21 (Treasures in Heaven) Matthew 25:14-30 (The Parable of the Talents) Matthew 25:31-46 (The Sheep and the Goats) Luke 16:19-31 (The Rich Man and Lazarus; this parable inspired Albert Schweitzer to do his humanitarian missions work in Africa)

lender.name: Simone & Michael
lender.loan_because: Giving is a nice thing to do
lender.occupational_info: Growing our family business which is a Painting & Decorating business

lender.name: Harminder Dhillon
lender.loan_because: Sharing and giving enriches; in every sense of the word.

lender.name: Norm & Michelle
lender.loan_because: It is not wealth one asks for, but just enough to preserve one's dignity, to work unhampered, to be generous, frank and independent - Maugham

lender.name: John, Parker and Jake
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do and a great lesson for my very fortunate children
lender.occupational_info: I manage capital

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: It's so simple to do and makes a difference in someone's life. All the recipients seem like such hard-working people just trying to make a better life for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a wife, daughter, mom of 4, grandmother of 1 and independent bookstore manager in Texas.

lender.name: Spencer
lender.occupational_info: I'm a 4th grader. I play the drums and I enjoy soccer and school.

lender.name: Karl & Safiah
lender.loan_because: i feel honoured to be a part of such a noble organization.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: Because I believe in changing the world and entrepreneurs lead the way.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I want to think globally and care especially about women across the world who are not as lucky as I am.
lender.occupational_info: I teach writing and reading to high school students in the United States.

lender.name: Jay and Christy
lender.loan_because: You can't put a price on helping somebody. And we can't put a price on all who paid the price. We've all had help along the way somewhere.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I won the lottery of being born in America. Others were not so lucky.
lender.occupational_info: I provide engineering support for a major avionics upgrade for Boeing 757 and 767 aircraft.

lender.name: Carlos & Claudia
lender.loan_because: I was born in a third world country in where many struggle to provide for their families. I have been lucky enough to have been raised in the United States, lucky to currently live in a country where there are vast amount of opportunities to improve oneself. Not everyone is as lucky as I have been. I believe that giving from the heart is a gift that benefits both parties at once- For me, helping someone else is a remembrance of where I originated from and how I got here today.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a stay at home mother to my two children. A long side caring for the children and home, I attend college in pursuit of a double major.

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: I believe we all want to have work which we enjoy and to have a happy life. I believe everyone should get that chance. I am grateful that I am able to help another person.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that builds satellites.

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I was doing a class project on Kiva, and after learning all about the company and its strategy, I signed up!
lender.occupational_info: I am earning a Masters degree at Stanford University.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a happy, secure and successful life.
lender.occupational_info: I returned to school after 30 years to earn a degree in International Business.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: My life is so blessed!

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I have read about microlending and feel my money would be put to good use. It also doesn't hurt that your organization has the same name as my dog.
lender.occupational_info: I work with kids ages 10-13 teaching them about world history.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with the options and freedom in my life and would like return my gratitude by helping others to grow and achieve the life they were meant to live. Helping entrepreneurs is a vehicle to the pay it forward to bring more joy and direction to the entire community!
lender.occupational_info: I help students believe in themselves to achieve and dream big through support and proper education.

lender.name: Bethany
lender.loan_because: It is a good thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I go to primary school. My dad gave me this money to lend out

lender.name: Anandi
lender.loan_because: I care. I admire entrepreneurs, especially women who go after their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Saving the world one day at a time.

lender.name: Emma
lender.occupational_info: I am 8 years old and I am sharing my birthday money until I know how I want to spend this gifts.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate to be born and raised as I was, where I was, thus having more than enough to satisfy basic needs. As an entrepreneur consultant, I realize how much difference a little bit can make in someone's life.

lender.name: fishpole
lender.loan_because: it reminds me of the fish pole saying and it's a message i want to pass to my kids

lender.name: Hakan
lender.loan_because: We travel very much around the world and meet so many wonderful people. It feels worthwhile if we can help directly with a loan and support the help-to-selfhelp concept and improve the standard of living for many developing countries.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.occupation: Serving EBBF - European Bahai Business Forum
lender.loan_because: education, trust and believing in the potential of human beings are three ways in which we can improve the world. Contributing to reducing poverty and with that reducing conflict is definitely a good practical way to lie our lives. After all: The earth is but one country and mankind its citizens.
lender.occupational_info:
Serving as Secretary General of EBBF (http://ebbf.org), co-founder of Hub Madrid (http://hubmadrid.com), tutor of social entrepreneurship at IE Business School...
Passionate about connecting individuals to their integrity, creativity and ethics. Inspiring them into action by linking them to other like-minded doers and to their ideas. Help achieve and showing the success that ethical behaviours create in business. Promoting the evolution towards a world which will be organised, act and behave as one country. Where the creativity of the diversity of its citizens will enhance the wellbeing and prosperity of humankind.

lender.name: Indi and Poppy
lender.occupational_info: We earn our living by being creative.

lender.name: Vera
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro financing is a better way to help people succeed. And because I truly admire the bravery of these entrepreneurs.

lender.name: shelley
lender.loan_because: i know that one small deed can mean a great deal. and that the best thing to receive is the joy you get from giving.
lender.occupational_info: mother, mentor, guidance goddess, lover, friend.....................and all things in between

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to be given financial and emotional support by my family throughout my life. I would like to help support the dreams and aspirations of others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professor who prepares college students to teach very young children - babies and preschoolers.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference in the world however and wherever I can.
lender.occupational_info: I handle all administrative duties for a major government corporation.

lender.name: jyotindra
lender.loan_because: I want to help small businessmen.
lender.occupational_info: I am financial consultant.

lender.name: Rn, Penny & Jodi
lender.loan_because: I like to help other people.

lender.name: steven jon fischer
lender.loan_because: I was raised to be a caring and giving person.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist and I also help musicians any way I can.

lender.name: Bruno Fernandes
lender.loan_because: One of million other ways to help who most need.
lender.occupational_info: Develop software tailormade solutions to customers.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I believe in promoting a global economy, and only through the entrepreneurial spirit can this be achieved.
lender.occupational_info: I design and maintain in house web applications

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I can. I am very blessed with a wonderful family and friends. Helping others helps me set a good example of community spirit for my young son.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I work in a legal aid office. Our programs help those at the poverty level, the elderly and disabled.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me in so many ways. I have so much in my life for which I am thankful. Helping others is a way for me to demonstrate my gratitude. Also, as we help others to succeed, we improve the condition of our world.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the business operations of a construction company.

lender.name: DIANE M
lender.loan_because: I THINK WE SHOULD ALL STRIVE FOR PEACE, HOPE AND FELLOWSHIP THROUGHOUT THE WORLD.
lender.occupational_info: HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONAL

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: love
lender.occupational_info: i write programs to keep computers working properly

lender.name: Pastor Janice
lender.loan_because: It's the very least that I can do.

lender.name: Vilas Dhar
lender.loan_because: I have seen the enormous impact microloans can have - and look forward to a world where access to capital is no longer a privilege but a right. Please join our support of MFI's around the world by joining our team at http://www.kiva.org/team/the_dhar_group, where we have made over 250 loans of at least $25.00 each
lender.occupational_info: At Dhar Law, LLP, we are working to build a law firm based on community lawyering - the idea that pro bono action, local engagement, and bringing together businesses and nonprofits can make a fundamental changes. Learn more at http://www.dharlawllp.com

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have extra resources, while others that work much harder than I do don't have enough
lender.occupational_info: I provide program and administrative support to the Bureau of Education and Cultural Affairs

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I want to give others the chance to make a living and support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I go to college.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I want to empower the poor of this world to escape poverty. I want to see the oppression of the poor come to an end.
lender.occupational_info: I am a structural engineer so I can design buildings to be safe and functional for the people who are using them.

lender.name: Beverley
lender.loan_because: It is important to help people. This type of program enables one to give a hand-up. I really like that concept.
lender.occupational_info: I am semi-retired. But I have been working as a part-time sales associate at a store called "Seven Shores Trading Co." The owners are dedicated to using Fair Trade practices when importing goods from around the world. They deal directly with the artisan, or local co-op, whenever possible. I have been a volunteer for many years, as a Sunday School teacher, and more recently at Operation Christmas Child. I have encouraged our Sunday School children to give...locally and worldwide. Some of our donations have gone to OCC, Samaritan's Purse, Salvation Army, ROOF, Sleeping Children Around the World, and local charities involving children or teens. It is very rewarding to see how generous the children have been. I will be encouraging them to become involved with Kiva in 2008.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I was a social worker but am now retired.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because:
I can not do great things. I can do small things with great love.
When we help another we make the world a better place.
Peace
lender.occupational_info: I loan millions of dollars to large companies.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to develop an educational sector for children.
lender.occupational_info: I am a private educationist, teaching and caring for children.

lender.name: Ruth & Shane
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in people's lives. We have been blessed with so much -We want to pass on the blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I help people use their computers so that they can help themselves

lender.name: Double Dog Farm
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the free market to create positive change
lender.occupational_info: I make little things big

lender.name: Will and Lindsay
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: We are proud parents.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I am a follower of Jesus Christ.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Pastor of Youth in an urban setting. My job is to organize and motivate adults to reach out to troubled teens and to share with them who Jesus is.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I like to see people have the chance to realize their dreams for a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in health care.

lender.name: Mike & Laurel
lender.loan_because: Just doing a small part to change the world for the better.

lender.name: Bettina
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with the love of good friends and family and I believe in paying it forward.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women and families.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of people who take calls and e-mails from our customers.

lender.name: Vivia
lender.loan_because: As someone who was once in need, someone was generous to me. I want to do the same!
lender.occupational_info: I study and teach at a university.

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because: I am making this loan in honor of my mother, Gale Kohlhagen, who recently won her battle with breast cancer (she's the pretty lady in green). As a tribute to her strength, I am donating this money, and plan to continue donating it to women in need (with a little more added each time) as it is perpetually repaid.

lender.name: Sardar
lender.loan_because: I want to raised my business

lender.name: Brianna
lender.occupation: child fitness instructor, detox monitor, intel off

lender.name: Kendra
lender.loan_because: I can see no greater use for my money than helping someone else help themselves.

lender.name: Ines
lender.loan_because: I see it as a way to not only help people who are in need, but with these loans we are helping people to help themselves.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing people succeed...and its always better to give than to receive.

lender.name: Crystal
lender.loan_because: I am able to help out more people with a loan than I ever could with a donation of the same amount. Once the loan is repaid, I can reinvest in other people who are working hard to provide for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I do odd jobs for a city's Parks and Recreation program, which helps keep kids active, entertained, and out of trouble. I currently do my work at the city's Aquatic Center and Community Center.

lender.name: Rani
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance is the best way to empower and encourage people to become self sufficient. It amazes me how a small loan can make such an impact on someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: We import metal accessories from a mid-size city in India and sell the products to wedding planners and florists. The products are made by individual artisans for the exporters.

lender.name: Katie
lender.occupational_info: I am studying psychology and storytelling in order to counsel people.

lender.name: QinoOne
lender.loan_because: It feels right to help others who are in need. We also believe in extending the concept of Fair Trade by supporting the people of Bolivia, the country where our quinoa grain comes from.
lender.occupational_info: We import and distribute French spirits, including Qino One Vodka, made with quinoa and rye.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.occupation: Office Support for Market Research Company
lender.loan_because: I want to help others and I have heard wonderful things about KIVA. I look forward to receiving progress reports and hearing from other lenders. Feel free to contact me.
lender.occupational_info: Help companies test new products

lender.name: Fr. Peter
lender.loan_because: I know that most people in the Third World do NOT want to exist on hand outs. To modify the words of the Chinese proverb a little "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Loan a man money so he can buy a fishing rod and so fish for himself then you feed him for a lifetime".
lender.occupational_info: To carry out my Christian ministry in whatever direction I am guided.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: it helps.

lender.name: Kristen Balascio
lender.loan_because: I have been so lucky to have great people come into my life when I've needed them most. I simply want to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I want to help break the cycle of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I fly emergency response helicopters.

lender.name: Riches Family
lender.occupational_info: Mining

lender.name: natasha
lender.loan_because: I want to give people the chance to improve their situation.

lender.name: Ramin
lender.loan_because: My dollar goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: always in state of learning

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: I first began lending as part of a social change assignment in Melody McMurry's sociology class. I believe in giving others a helping hand up - not a hand out. We can all offer HOPE by Helping Others Prosper Economically.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I paint the insides of peoples home . They pick the colors and I put them on.

lender.name: Priscilla
lender.loan_because: This is one of the best opportunities to give back that I have come across in a long time. To play a part in improving the circumstances of another human being is priceless, especially when it is a means to make them self sufficient. I think it's fantastic!

lender.name: Gospelchor Michelbach
lender.loan_because: "Think about his love"

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: it takes money to make money. I also like that my loan goes to a specific individual with a specific vision and goal.
lender.occupational_info: I treat mental illness. The photo shows my helpers who come to work with me.

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: I think it is a good way to apply the proverb: "If you want to help a hungry man don't give him a fish, teach him to fish up"

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I have a small business and know how hard it is to make it successful, even when you live in a place with a lot of resources. I hope in some small way to help others. Perhaps I may learn something to help my little business in the process.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: What comes around goes around.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: This concept is such a great idea that I had to help. As others have said, I am blessed with so much that to participate with a small loan (or loans) that will make an incredible difference to someone in another part of the world is the least I can do.

lender.name: Curtis
lender.loan_because: I want to help the poor and I believe microfinance is the best way to assist the poor in a sustainable way, to give them a "hand up instead of a hand out."

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: If my small tiny loan can make bigger dreams happen, then it is a good day!

lender.name: Jlaine
lender.loan_because: We believe in a Hand Up over a Hand Out

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: giving is something that is important to me, and through Kiva I can give and continue to give, without feeling like my money could have been wasted or misused.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I am working on a financial literacy program called The Secure Student, which teaches teenage students how to make smart decisions with their money in order to be better prepared for the future. I am also going to school and hoping to start up a business of my own when I have the time.

lender.name: Jacqui
lender.occupational_info: I help run advertising on the TV, radio, newspaper, and internet so people will know about new products available from my clients

lender.name: The Hallz
lender.loan_because: it is a blessing to be able to play some small role in empowering individuals in developing countries!
lender.occupational_info: We dream up and illustrate ideas to motivate other to purchase things, we teach electrical engineering technology, and we are constantly learning new concepts everyday.

lender.name: Global Kids in TSL
lender.occupation: Global Kids: 8 Interns in Teen Second Life
lender.loan_because: We know how much change can happen if everyday people, and especially teens, make it a priority to care about those who have less opportunity, and know that our loan makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: We're a group of teens from around the world that gather in the online community & virtual world of Second Life. We're all working to educate our peers about social and global issues that we care about.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I have more than I really need and would like to assist others in getting a better lifestyle.
lender.occupational_info: I design things to make some machines work better. (Dont be confused by the photo - I am not a real farmer even though I once had some steers which I fed prime lucern and showed to my friends - so they were by definition 'show steers').

lender.name: Andrea and Jim
lender.loan_because: It does good ... it feels good.
lender.occupational_info: We are a husband and wife team who use our marketing and communications skills to help banks and insurance companies to sell their products.

lender.name: Paris & Georgina
lender.loan_because: we believe in the positive impact a loan can have on someone's life.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: A little loan can go a long way. With what local lenders charge for interest, it's sometimes impossible for people to pay it back and net a benefit.
lender.occupational_info: I work building websites on the internet and making applications for Apple's iPhone.

lender.name: Rose Marie
lender.loan_because:
To give the less fortunate a chance at success in life.
It is our company thrust to balance corporate profits with social/environmental responsiveness.
lender.occupational_info: Commercial and residential property sales in the US, China, Phils. and Dubai

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I loan because the life of a student is self-centered. Kiva provides a great outlet to focus on people other than yourself.
lender.occupational_info: I currently attend school in New England for economics and finance.

lender.name: Leif
lender.loan_because: It is better that a little be given in time, than much when it is too late. "Somadeva - Kashmir, 1035-1085"

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: If my loan can give these people a chance to gain more economic freedom, its the least that I can do.
lender.occupational_info: Working on my second degree as a nurse. One day I hope to work abroad..

lender.name: Flavio
lender.loan_because: I believe loans have a greater impact than donations.
lender.occupational_info: I own a company which operates a retail outlet. I'm also studying Business Studies with the Open University in England.

lender.name: Jama Software
lender.loan_because: We believe in giving back, from the very start. Even as a technology start-up, we're committed as a company to helping others succeed as we grow.
lender.occupational_info: We help companies innovate through the use of our collaborative requirements management software called Contour. For every customer that buys Contour, we set aside marketing dollars to sponsor new Kiva loan recipients each quarter. Enjoy the journey!

lender.name: Hsu Kang
lender.loan_because: I want to be involved in helping others make a change for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a team that helps companies become beautiful.

lender.name: Soroush / Mike
lender.loan_because: As a Baha'i I value all races, religions and nations. I am fortunate and wish to share with my brothers and sisters across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired specialist teacher and am now a gallery photographer. I look for interesting compositions, light and color.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: this is the best way to create lasting change. "Be the change that you want to see in the world." - Gandhi

lender.name: Scott & Beth
lender.loan_because: We believe microfinance provides EQUAL opportunities for the lender and borrower. It really works!
lender.occupational_info: My company repairs high voltage equipment such as transformers, electric motors, wind turbines and other large electric equipment. Beth teaches Pre-K ESL (four-year olds) in a public school system. Her students represent over 15 different languages.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: It's effective, simple and promotes good will and global citizenship. I have witnessed first hand the awarding of large loans that don't have near the impact of a small loan made directly to an entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: I am a director of food services for an international service/finance company.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I care about others. I love to help people who want to help themselves. Kiva is a wonderful program for us to lend a helping hand to others.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I want agriculture to thrive worldwide, and produce both the quality and quantity food the world needs.
lender.occupational_info: I assist producers is marketing their production and managing their risk.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is required.
lender.occupational_info: Life is about making it happen in all you do!

lender.name: Pengy
lender.loan_because: The money will just rot in my bank otherwise.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers.

lender.name: Ursula & Dylan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make their dream a reality.
lender.occupational_info: I

lender.name: Charm
lender.loan_because: Matt 25:40 That which you do to the least of my brethren, that you do unto Me.
lender.occupational_info: Assisting my employer with anything that will make his job easier.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: Do not neglect to do good and to share what you have, for such sacrifices are pleasing to God. - Hebrews 13:16

lender.name: Dara
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: I run a website on the Internet that helps give free advice to anyone who wants it.

lender.name: Monica
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers and keep them up and running

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am delighted by the fact that I can play a part in changing someone's future and allow them to provide for their family.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the local university assisting students. I have a 20 year old daughter and an 18 year old son who are both studying at university.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: The disparity that exists in the world is personally unconscionable to me.

lender.name: Calvin
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Studying to make a difference...

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: My sister gave us a Kiva gift certificate two Christmas' ago. It is a gift that continues to give.

lender.name: Reneé & Jason
lender.loan_because: We want to help make the world a better place. We have such an abundance of everything in America while people and families in other countries go with out. God has blessed us in our lives and we would like to share that with others!
lender.occupational_info: Jason is an IT Professional which means he works on and maintains computers and servers a business needs to operate. Reneé works as a photographer, taking pictures of families, kids, weddings, and pets. She also volunteers at an Aquarium, teaching the public about the local animals that live in the Pacific Ocean off of San Diego. She is currently attending college fulltime to become a Middle School Science teacher.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: one must practice what they preach.
lender.occupational_info: I study international development and urban planning.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to teach my child to get involved with the world. Lead by example.
lender.occupational_info: I am an assistant manager for a great company that makes loans and creates savings oppertunites for its members. I work for a credit union.

lender.name: patrick
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Somsak
lender.loan_because: I believe in people's goodwill to make their lives better.

lender.name: Adrianne M
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I have a Bachelor of Science degree in Information Systems Management, and am currently working full-time towards a Master of Science degree in Information Technology.

lender.name: Rafael
lender.loan_because: Because I can.
lender.occupational_info: Delivering packages to people.

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: it makes such a large impact not only for the one your lending to but for everyone around them,.

lender.name: Mark and Kathryn
lender.loan_because: it allows me to use a small amount of money to assist others to benefit themselves and their societies without introducing dependencies.
lender.occupational_info: I design computer software to support space vehicles.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: As a pharmacist I take for granted the availability of medicines and other basic healthcare.
lender.occupational_info: I sell medicines to help heal sick people.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I'm Lucky, God has truly blessed me - but I grew up poor. People helped me when I needed it; now its my turn to help others. Plus, I have worked on Overseas Aid Programs and know the difference it makes.
lender.occupational_info: Self Employed; Play the Stock Market and run Internet Businesses.

lender.name: yusek
lender.loan_because: Por que me gusta ayudar a la gente
lender.occupational_info: Soy un programador...

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others get ahead and micro-lending allows the donations to help a lot of people.

lender.name: Eryn
lender.loan_because: My very generous brother introduced me to Kiva by getting me a credit for my birthday this year.
lender.occupational_info: I assist in the designing, the drawing and the construction administration of buildings and remodeling of buildings.

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: We want to help entrepreneurs get started.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the financial computer systems for a small city in Ontario, Canada.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: ...I'm very grateful for the fact that my own financial problems are getting better. Because I had someone to help me out a little and now I'd like to help others who maybe do not have this opportunity

lender.name: Corinne
lender.loan_because: It makes a positive change in people's circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: Managing the operations of a global public opinion research company that gives voice to people around the world.

lender.name: FURIO
lender.loan_because: Mi piace pensare che con l'aiuto di tutti noi qualcuno possa realizzare il proprio sogno...
lender.occupational_info: Mi occupo di Pubbliche Relazioni e sviluppo lavoro on line tramite il mio sito...mi piacerebbe entrare in contatto con più persone possibili per realizzare progetti importanti

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: It is good to help anyone who is willing to work and improve themselves. I was helped, so I help others.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell houses after fixing them up. I also rent out apartments, many to the poorer folks who need a break.

lender.name: Jo-ellen
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to and I should!

lender.name: Kaylyn
lender.loan_because: Compared to people living in poverty I have abundant wealth. For the $25 I only have to skip lunch out 2 times...a pretty easy sacrifice.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a graphic design & marketing company. We create print and online material for real estate companies, outdoors companies, and technology companies.

lender.name: Puja
lender.loan_because: it's one of the best uses of my money.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: Lending has been my profession. I know how beneficial it is to the individual and the community when a loan enables someone to improve their lot in life, thereby improving the community. I get a tremendous amount of satisfaction out of helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I am the CEO of a credit union that serves the residents of a specific geographic region in the Southwestern United States. The Credit Union has 45 employees dedicated to improving the lives of those people and businesses that we serve. I am the lucky one who gets to direct our resources to accomplish goals that we set with our Board of Directors.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: Each one reach one, each one teach one.
lender.occupational_info: Helping nonprofits figure out how to maximize their use of technology in order to fullfill their organizations' missions.

lender.name: tom
lender.loan_because: i need more money to buy a laptop and some computers for my studio editing. to add some quality to my work so as to attract more customer to my bussiness.
lender.occupational_info: i deals in video recording, photographingand also editing

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: God is great and He has been very good to me. I want to share His goodness with others.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to maintain a high standard of quality and service and teach others how to do the same in order to improve the quality of life for everyone.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Small business owners all over the world can make a nice living with the help of small loans, and they can build stronger businesses for themselves and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I make maps accessible to people who come into our library. We have maps of the entire world, but we specialize in the state of Georgia and the USA.

lender.name: Lone
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed that i can help other woman to get independent and I love to help children with education. Please look at : http://www.galileeschool.org/
lender.occupational_info: secretary - writing journals for doctors in a large hospital.

lender.name: Elissa
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my students that every person can make a big difference in the lives of others, a lesson I hope I can practice in my life every day.
lender.occupational_info: I teach science, including agriculture science, to school age children in urban schools. Most of my students are labeled "at-risk" and live in low-income areas.

lender.name: Bret
lender.loan_because: "insert something corny here"

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It is a wonderful way to make a huge impact on another person's life with such a small amount of money. The reward for me is humble satisfaction, knowing that I can do something positive! And I have a big smile in my heart right now.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and train people how to make money a really fun way with premium Health and Wellness Products (Vegan certified)

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: Help others use the computer system to be more efficient.

lender.name: Rodney
lender.loan_because: It feels good!

lender.name: B.G.
lender.loan_because: The talking dogs in my head told me to. Really. Some talking dogs urge you to do terrible things, my talking dogs tell me to be kind to my neighbors. Seriously.
lender.occupational_info:
My work is a real pain in the ass! Do you understand your ass being in pain? It's as if my mother-in-law kicked me in it!
I WISH I was born RICH instead of GOOD LOOKING! (Then I could lend more money!)

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It's so easy and it really helps make a difference to someone.
lender.occupational_info: Everything that goes with being a wife and mother

lender.name: Cartwright
lender.loan_because: Some students at Cartwright Elementary participated in an after school service academy. The students organized a raffle to raise money for Kiva. These students have learned how important it is to help others around the world.

lender.name: Victoria L
lender.occupational_info: I act as an executive assistant and advisor to small business owners.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time university student. My primary interest is the relationship between humans and the natural world.

lender.name: Jerry and Cindy
lender.loan_because: We've been very fortunate, and this is an opportunity to give a little back.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I want to help people bring their dreams to life

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: Bright, alive, perky, loving, original

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: It helps me to see a little part of the world :)

lender.name: unicorn
lender.loan_because: make the world a better place
lender.occupational_info: A family of four in Menlo Park

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: it's so easy to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I advise people with respect to their financial plan, their investments and help them articulate and reach their financial goals.

lender.name: Katy and Christian
lender.loan_because: We are grateful for what we've been blessed with and want to help to empower less fortunate people to succeed.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: one donation can continually touch and improve so many lives.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: It can help others in need.

lender.name: Allyson
lender.loan_because: I want to enable others to provide for themselves and become economically independent.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a science lab developing methods to explore the brain.

lender.name: Jim OD
lender.loan_because: it makes sense. Our family is so fortunate, we want to help. Carol and I are pictured here with 3 of our grandkids.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for a large life insurance company providing financial protection for individuals and families against the risk of early death.

lender.name: Sylvie
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I answer the telephones for a government department.

lender.name: Agent J
lender.loan_because: My friend invited me to 'give the gift of love that goes around the world"
lender.occupational_info: i draw, i color, I paint, I write. It's that easy.
